Class DistributedReference<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kuujo.copycat.Resource
      • net.kuujo.copycat.atomic.DistributedReference<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsyncReference<T>

    public class DistributedReference<T>
extends Resource
implements AsyncReference<T>
    Asynchronous atomic value.

    Jordan Halterman
